title: So many feeders
body: Well i was in gold 5 promos and had so much shit teammates that i got back to s3 like wtf is this. I legit have to say is anyone gonna feed in champ select and if they do feed i just afk, and worse of all they DONT SURRENDER! PLEASE GIVE ME GOOD TEAMMATES

replies.body:
Now, we all hate it when people die numerous amounts of times, even for no reason at all. But there's nothing we can do to stop them.

Mentally what you can do is help their lane out so you give them a few kills, and just politely say "Hey, is it ok if you stay under the turret to stay safe? We'll gank when ever we can."

One thing to not do is get stressed by this happening. If they refuse to listen or say no, then you may report as they've chosen not to help the team and they've chosen to be a negative person.
